title: Google\Cloud\Sql\V1beta4\BackupRetentionSettings
name: BackupRetentionSettings
description:
We currently only support backup retention by specifying the number of backups we will retain.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.sql.v1beta4.BackupRetentionSettings

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.retained_backups
params.description: Depending on the value of retention_unit, this is used to determine if a backup needs to be deleted. If retention_unit is 'COUNT', we will retain this many backups.

methods.description:
